text: The Hidden is a 1987 science fiction action horror movie produced and released by New Life Cinema and directed by Jack Sholder. It stars Kyle MacLachlan, Michael Nouri, Ed O'Ross, Clu Gulager, Chris Mulkey, Clarence Felder, Larry Cedar, Claudia Christian and Tony Anholt. A sequel The Hidden II was released in 1993. == Other websites == * * Category:1987 action movies Category:1987 science fiction movies Category:1987 horror movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Jack Sholder Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life
title: The Hidden (1987 movie)
